profile.name: Sang Hyup Han
profile.message: Using skill is the best way to show my ability

about.title: #First Line
texts: During edit my resume with a text editor, a voice from my mind asked me..
"is it a proper way to showing my development skills?"
"wait.. but, you are a frontend developer
then, I realize that it is not the best way.
so, what is good way to do?
was stupid question.. the answer was simple
the answer was that just make a web page with skills!
